summary: George Harrison's friends, family, and bandmates unite for a tribute concert on the one-year anniversary of his death.
cast: Joe Brown|Eric Clapton|Jools Holland|Sam Brown|Jeff Lynne|Paul McCartney|Billy Preston|Ringo Starr|Malcolm Abbs|Ron Blair|Gary Brooker|Mark Brown|Mike Campbell|Jim Capaldi|Michael Clarke|Carol Cleveland|Ray Cooper|Andy Fairweather Low|Steve Ferrone|Terry Gilliam|Dhani Harrison|Olivia Harrison|Bob Hunter|Eric Idle|Neil Innes|Terry Jones|Michael Kamen|Jim Keltner|Kathleen Kissoon|Albert Lee|Marc Mann|Tessa Niles|Michael Palin|Tom Petty|David Porter Thomas|Anoushka Shankar|Ravi Shankar|Benmont Tench|Scott Thurston|Fred Tomlinson|Klaus Voormann|Tom Hanks|George Harrison
title: Concert for George
